original_text: And when they prevailed over them, the Hagrites and all who were with them were given into their hands, for they cried out to God in the battle, and he granted their urgent plea because they trusted in him.
korean_text: 도우심을 입었으므로 하갈 사람과 그들과 함께 있는 자들이 다 그들의 손에 패하였으니 이는 그들이 싸울 때에 하나님께 의뢰하고 부르짖으므로 하나님이 그들에게 응답하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: And when they prevailed over them,
the Hagrites and all who were with them
sentences.korean_translation: 하그라 사람들과 그들과 함께 있던 모든 자는

sentences.original_text: for they cried out to God in the battle,
and he granted their urgent plea
